resources.string: In Alexandria, you will find very comfortable accommodations with a varied budget. From $50,000 COP, you can access a room with all the necessary amenities.
When coming to Alexandria, you must be prepared to be amazed by the flavors of the region. Experience the finest flavors in Antioquia tantalizing your taste buds.
Dont worry about where to stay. Alexandria has hotels, hostels, cabins, and various places to accommodate you. Come with your family, as there is space for everyone.
We are ComeToMyTown, responsible for ensuring that you lack nothing in every adventure. We make sure that from the moment you arrive until you leave each township, you enjoy every second.
